means: （由于协议、合约等而）发生关系的

sentence.Network_en: The brass plate must be adherent to the steel.
He was most liberal where money would bring him a powerful or necessary political adherent.
sentence.Network_cn: 在金钱能够收买一个干练的或者必需的政治拥护者的地方,他是最不惜花钱的.

sentence.Network_en: Rip's sole domestic adherent was his dog Wolf, who was as much hen - pecked as his master.
sentence.Network_cn: 在家里,瑞普的唯一知己就是那条名叫“狼”的狗,“狼”和他主人一样怕女主人.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French adherent, from Latin adhaerent- 'sticking to', from the verb adhaerere (see adhere)

entry.def: An adherent is someone who holds a particular belief or supports a particular person or group.

example.tran: 这种观念正在赢得更多的拥护者。

means.word_mean: 1. someone who believes and helps to spread the doctrine of another

auth_sentence.content: To be adherent to the King's enemies.
auth_sentence.res_content: To be adherent to the King's enemies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To be adherent to the King's enemies.

auth_sentence.content: But what if she was an adherent of intelligent design?
auth_sentence.res_content: But what if she was an adherent of intelligent design?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But what if she was an adherent of intelligent design?

auth_sentence.content: This doesn't particularly differentiate your theory from the hundreds of few-adherent physics theories we delete all the time.
auth_sentence.res_content: This doesn't particularly differentiate your theory from the hundreds of few-adherent physics theories we delete all the time.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This doesn't particularly differentiate your theory from the hundreds of few-adherent physics theories we delete all the time.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 一致的,协调的;[话语等]条理清楚的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cohere[v.附着;粘着]+ent……的→coherent粘在一起的;一致的,协调的
co共同+hes粘附+ion表名词→cohere的名词

sentences.en: The proposal is gaining more and more adherents.
sentences.cn: 该建议得到越来越多的支持者。

sentences.en: He is a leader with many adherents.
sentences.cn: 他是个有众多追随者的领袖。
